attributes.action: Change the new passport design to include a fair balance of men and women.
attributes.additional_details: What happened to Vanessa Bell, Dorothy Tennant and other female artists, architects and scholars. Sign if you to are exasperated by gender discrimination! The thought that £400 million and ten years worth of thinking has led to the creation of such a sexist document which we are forced to obtain for the price of £72.50 disgusts me - women have the vote, but in order to gain complete gender equality, we should stand up to injustice and fight for equal representation and credit for women's work.
attributes.background: It would seem that the feminist battle is not yet over. Despite winning the fight over showing women on more cash notes, new passports have been designed which feature seven men and only two women! Sign this is you are fed up of gender inequality and want change!
